stores.name: Olive Oil
stores.description: Friendly atmosphere. Great selection of local brews.

stores.name: Sour on King
stores.description: Amazing selection of everything sour, fermented and tart.

location.address: King William Street, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: The French
stores.description: High end french restaurant on the hippest street in town.

location.address: The French, King William Street, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Rust City Brewery
stores.description: A family run urban coffee house, craft beer pub and brewpub combining our love of coffee, beer and people

location.address: 27 King William Street, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Berkeley North
stores.description: Set in the revitalized James St. North neighbourhood, Berkeley North is a West Coast inspired restaurant located on historic King William Street in the heart of downtown Hamilton.

location.address: 31 King William St, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Mezcal Tacos & Tequila
stores.description: Familiar Mexican fare with a gourmet twist & housemade margaritas, plus a lively late-night scene.

location.address: 150 James St S, Hamilton, ON L8P 3A2, Canada

stores.name: Two Black Sheep
stores.description: Intimate, rustic-chic bar providing oysters, charcuterie, cheese plates, wine & craft cocktails.

location.address: 163 John St S, Hamilton, ON L8N 2C3, Canada

stores.name: Donut Monster
stores.description: Small-batch, from-scratch donuts available at select coffee shops on Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays.

location.address: The Kitchen Collective, King Street East, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: The Harbour Diner
stores.description: Classic diner eats like eggs Benedict & club sandwiches star at this charming, old-timey nook.

location.address: The Harbour Diner, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Charred
stores.description: BBQ chicken prepared Portugese style over an open charcoal pit.

location.address: Charred Rotisserie House, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Green Bar
stores.description: Cheery counter-serve serving organic, health-conscious fare such as smoothies & simple vegan eats.

location.address: Green Bar, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Work
stores.description: Dive bar, unreal nachos and huge selection of beers on both on tap and in bottle.

location.address: Work Restaurant, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Born & Raised
stores.description: Wood fired Pizzas, oysters and a modern take on classic Italian dishes. Great collection of locals beers.

location.address: Born & Raised, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: The Burnt Tongue
stores.description: Counter-serve joint with an ever-changing selection of elevated soups, plus burgers & other fare.

location.address: The Burnt Tongue, Cannon Street East, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Bar Izakaya
stores.description: Incorporating local meats and produce with the finest Japanese ingredients. The menu consists of Rice bowls and Ramen, while the evening menu is served family style with small & medium sharing plates and house board options.

location.address: Bar Izakaya, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada

stores.name: Mulberry Coffee
stores.description: Chill cafe in the former lobby of an 1880s hotel serving coffee, sweets & panini, plus cocktails.

location.address: Mulberry Street Coffeehouse, James Street North, Hamilton, ON, Canada
